name: Secret Escape
description:
***WORK IN PROGRESS***

INSTRUCTIONS

WASD or Arrow keys to move. SPACE to interact with items in front of  you.

DESCRIPTION

Foxy got lost in the woods. Help him find the Secret Escape. Navigate around the map, interact and objects and look for clues. Watch out for traps and monsters!

WEB MONETIZATION

Monetized users get extra hints and extra levels.

MADE WITH

Zdog: https://zzz.dog/

AnimeJS: https://animejs.com/

HowlerJS: https://howlerjs.com/
